qas.question: How much was public expenditure on the island in 2001-2002?
By 2005-06 public expenditure had risen to what?
UK aid had risen to how much in the same period?
Wages and salaries represent how much % of the island's expenditure?

context: Public expenditure rose from <a0_0>£10 million<a0_0/> in 2001-02 to <a1_0>£12 million<a1_0/> in 2005-06 to <a2_0>£28m<a2_0/> in 2012-13. The contribution of UK budgetary aid to total SHG government expenditure rose from £4.6 million in to £6.4 million to <a3_0>£12.1 million<a3_0/> over the same period. Wages and salaries represent about <a4_0>38%<a4_0/> of recurrent expenditure.
